thread.title: Title Alliance Announces Continued Mid-Atlantic Region Growth with Greater Newtown Abstract
thread.title_full: Title Alliance Announces Continued Mid-Atlantic Region Growth with Greater Newtown Abstract

author: Lindsay Smith
title: Title Alliance Announces Continued Mid-Atlantic Region Growth with Greater Newtown Abstract
text:
Title Alliance, a RESPA-compliant ESOP company that specializes in joint ventured title insurance agencies, announced today that their Mid-Atlantic footprint continues to grow. Greater Newtown Abstract , a new partnership between Keller Williams Newtown and Title Alliance, marks Title Alliance’s 23rd Keller Williams-affiliated relationship. “This new partnership is not only an expansion of our company’s presence in this region, it is a testament to our continued faith in working with Keller Williams,” says Bill O’Connell, Director for Title Alliance Ltd. “Each time we partner with another Keller Williams office we know that both of our companies benefit from the level of experience each brings to the table. This is an exciting time for our partners and our clients.”
The market center is already profitable despite only six months of operation. Larry Minsky, Team Leader, has overseen the growth of the Market Center to its current tally of 60 agents.
“Choosing to partner with Title Alliance was an easy decision,” says John McClintock, Operating Principal of Keller Williams Newtown. “When you look at a number of title companies from all over the region, it quickly becomes clear Title Alliance is the best one for a company like ours to work with. We come from similar foundations and share a vision on how to operate in the real estate industry.”
The market center is located at:
12 Terry Drive, Suite 204
Newtown, PA 18904, US
Parties interested in buying or selling a home can visit http://www.KellerWilliamsNewtown.com for more information.
About Title Alliance :
Title Alliance, Ltd, an ESOP Company is located in Media, PA and has been creating RESPA compliant title joint ventures since 1983 with lenders, mortgage bankers, realtors, builders and credit unions. Their roots date back to 1948 when their first agency, which is still in existence today, was formed. For more information or to find out how a Title Alliance's partnership or title management skills could benefit you visit them online or contact Lindsay Smith at 800-220-3901 x 165.
